${ModID}:MagnetRise.NAME: Magnet Rise
${ModID}:MagnetRise.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL If you generated extra [E] 本回合, this card costs 0。

${ModID}:TearApart.NAME: Tear Apart
${ModID}:TearApart.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If this kills an enemy, 获得 [E] 。 NL ${ModID}:Echo。

${ModID}:Voices.NAME: Voices
${ModID}:Voices.DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! 张牌。 NL ${ModID}:Echo. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Flashlight.NAME: Flashlight
${ModID}:Flashlight.DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL 获得 [E] . NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:Flashlight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL 获得 [E] . NL 下回合, 获得 [E] 。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Discharge.NAME: Discharge
${ModID}:Discharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 5 times [E] spent 本回合。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 5 times [E] spent 本回合. NL (Deals !D! damage.)

${ModID}:Overload.NAME: Overload
${ModID}:Overload.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Increase this card's damage by !M! 并cost by 1 本场战斗。

${ModID}:Panacher.NAME: Panacher
${ModID}:Panacher.DESCRIPTION: Every time 5 cards are created, deal !M! damage to 所有敌人。

${ModID}:Slowing.NAME: Slowing
${ModID}:Slowing.DESCRIPTION: 你的回合开始时， 获得 [E] . NL Add !M! *Wounds into your hand。
${ModID}:Slowing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 你的回合开始时， 获得 [E] . NL Add a *Wound into your hand。

${ModID}:Crystallize.NAME: Crystallize
${ModID}:Crystallize.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 点 格挡 for each [E] available。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 点 格挡 for each [E] available. NL (获得s !B! 点 格挡 。)
